mapper.insert: insert into donation_project_tb values ( 0, #{donationProjectTitle}, #{donationProjectOrganization}, #{donationProjectOrganizationImageUrl}, #{donationProjectImageUrl}, #{donationCategoryId}, #{donationProjectCurrentAmount}, #{donationProjectTargetAmount}, now(), now(), #{donationProjectType}, now(), now() )
mapper.select: select dpt.donation_project_id, dpt.donation_project_title, dpt.donation_project_organization, dpt.donation_project_organization_image_url, dpt.donation_project_image_url, dpt.donation_category_id, dpt.donation_project_current_amount, dpt.donation_project_target_amount, dpt.donation_project_start_date, dpt.donation_project_end_date, dpt.create_date, dpt.update_date, dct.donation_category_name_kor from donation_project_tb dpt left outer join donation_category_tb dct on(dpt.donation_category_id = dct.donation_category_id) where dpt.donation_project_id = #{donationProjectId}

select dpt.donation_project_id, dpt.donation_project_title, dpt.donation_project_organization, dpt.donation_project_organization_image_url, dpt.donation_project_image_url, dpt.donation_category_id, dpt.donation_project_current_amount, dpt.donation_project_target_amount, dpt.donation_project_start_date, dpt.donation_project_end_date, dpt.create_date, dpt.update_date, dct.donation_category_name_kor from donation_project_tb dpt left outer join donation_category_tb dct on(dpt.donation_category_id = dct.donation_category_id)

select dpt.donation_project_id, dpt.donation_project_title, dpt.donation_project_organization, dpt.donation_project_organization_image_url, dpt.donation_project_image_url, dpt.donation_category_id, dpt.donation_project_current_amount, dpt.donation_project_target_amount, dpt.donation_project_start_date, dpt.donation_project_end_date, dpt.create_date, dpt.update_date, dct.donation_category_name_kor from donation_project_tb dpt left outer join donation_category_tb dct on(dpt.donation_category_id = dct.donation_category_id) where 1 = 1 and dpt.donation_project_type = 'DONATION'
and dpt.donation_category_id = #{donationCategoryId}
order by
dpt.create_date DESC
dpt.donation_project_current_amount DESC
dpt.donation_project_current_amount ASC
(dpt.donation_project_current_amount / dpt.donation_project_target_amount) DESC
dpt.donation_project_end_date ASC
dpt.create_date DESC
limit #{startIndex}, #{count}
mapper.update: update donation_project_tb set donation_project_title = #{donationProjectTitle}, donation_project_organization = #{donationProjectOrganization}, donation_project_organization_image_url = #{donationProjectOrganizationImageUrl}, donation_project_image_url = #{donationProjectImageUrl}, donation_category_id = #{donationCategoryId}, donation_project_current_amount = #{donationProjectCurrentAmount}, donation_project_target_amount = #{donationProjectTargetAmount}, donation_project_start_date = #{donationProjectStartDate}, donation_project_end_date = #{donationProjectEndDate}, update_date = now() where donation_project_id = #{donationProjectId}

UPDATE donation_project_tb SET donation_project_current_amount = donation_project_current_amount + #{donationProjectContributionAmount}, update_date = NOW() WHERE donation_project_id = #{donationProjectId}
mapper.select: select dpt.donation_project_id, dpt.donation_project_title, dpt.donation_project_organization, dpt.donation_project_organization_image_url, dpt.donation_project_image_url, dpt.donation_category_id, dpt.donation_project_current_amount, dpt.donation_project_target_amount, dpt.donation_project_start_date, dpt.donation_project_end_date, dpt.create_date, dpt.update_date, dct.donation_category_name_kor, coalesce(sum(dt.donation_project_contribution_amount), 0) as total_contribution, max(dt.donation_project_contribution_date) as last_contribution_date from donation_project_tb dpt left join donation_category_tb dct on dpt.donation_category_id = dct.donation_category_id inner join donation_project_contribution_tb dt on dpt.donation_project_id = dt.donation_project_id where dt.user_id = #{userId} group by dpt.donation_project_id, dpt.donation_project_title, dpt.donation_project_organization, dpt.donation_project_organization_image_url, dpt.donation_project_image_url, dpt.donation_category_id, dpt.donation_project_current_amount, dpt.donation_project_target_amount, dpt.donation_project_start_date, dpt.donation_project_end_date, dpt.create_date, dpt.update_date, dct.donation_category_name_kor order by last_contribution_date DESC
